We certainly don't want to lose you as a customer. Feel free to send us a DM w/ your account info and we can continue the conversation. ^TF

The port on the Gateway is disabled, so unfortunately it won't work for a direct connection. ^TF
Thanks! If it's a cable box, it will not supply Internet, so it needs to be connected to the Hitron if you want a direct connection. ^TF
When you say Arris, are you referring to your Gateway box? (Arris also makes modems, so just want to be sure.) ^TF
